content: The Puppet Spider has most hands tied behind its back, leaving two free that it can use to slice you. It also has poison to shoot in your direction and a couple of worms that emerge from egg sacs to fight alongside it. Take care of the worms first, so you have fewer enemies to deal with at once and take some Antimiasma Powder to cure yourself of poisoning if it gets too bad.
promot:
This excerpt is taken from the file "Puppet_Spider_Spirit.md", within the section "Puppet Spider Spirit" and the sub-section "Puppet Spider Fight". The content is presented below:

The Puppet Spider has most hands tied behind its back, leaving two free that it can use to slice you. It also has poison to shoot in your direction and a couple of worms that emerge from egg sacs to fight alongside it. Take care of the worms first, so you have fewer enemies to deal with at once and take some Antimiasma Powder to cure yourself of poisoning if it gets too bad.
